docs.title: 📘 Project Changelog
docs.text:
Welcome to the official Shadow Agent changelog.

Here you’ll find a chronological record of new features, improvements, and bug fixes. We maintain this log to keep you informed about what’s new, what’s changing, and what’s been fixed.

docs.title: 📅 How to Use This Changelog
docs.text:
• Versions are listed in descending order — the latest updates come first.
  • Each version is grouped into:
  • ✨ Added — New features and additions.
  • ⚙️ Changed — Updates and improvements to existing features.
  • 🐛 Fixed — Bug fixes and patches.

docs.title: 🏁 Browse all versions in the sidebar.
docs.text:
• 👉 View the latest release
  • 🗂️ Browse all versions in the sidebar.

Happy Coding! 🚀

docs.title: ✨ Added
docs.text:
• Enhanced Content Security Policy to further bolster security.
  • Secure SameSite cookies used for authentication, reducing attack surface.
  • Single Sign-On (SSO) enabled via SameSite cookies.
  • Routing Table added for better navigation.
  • Improved Insights date picker for easier data selection.
  • Clicking on AUX or Presence in the User Leaderboard now redirects to the user’s profile page.
  • Friendly URLs for all CX and EX APIs and WebSockets.

docs.title: ⚙️ Changed
docs.text:
• Cherry-pick feature redesigned in newUI.
  • Select Language checkbox added to avoid user confusion.
  • Leaderboard filters and column configurations in Insights are now sticky on refresh.
  • Removed hardcoded urls from CX.
  • Timed Presences are now serverside, using SQS and step functions for timing.

docs.title: 🐛 Fixed
docs.text:
• Login screen no longer flashes when the user is authorized.
  • BrowserPhone set to false no longer causes theme change crashes.
  • Compact Widgets settings now save correctly.
  • Translate race condition that forced the site into English.

docs.title: ✨ Added
docs.text:
• Demo playback feature for admin portal
  • Ability to save recordings of demo events
  • Cleanup for hung calls on demo event playback
  • Queue presences have independent loading circles
  • Garbage collector inside of WebSocket handler to destroy bad user presences

docs.title: 🐛 Fixed
docs.text:
• Translate recursive refresh loop SAS-250
  • Custom presence being selected SAS-244
  • General presence change improvements

docs.title: ✨ Added
docs.text:
• restrictToDepartment feature flag SAS-203
  • Timed presence without switchback option SAS-216
  • Disposition Tab Custom Development SAS-255
  • New Portal Tab SAS-223
  • Expected wait time feature SAS-256
  • Dialer visbility changes & resize coordinates SAS-254 & SAS-139
  • Default tab SAS-233 & SAS-263
  • Scheduled Auto-Logoff SAS-279
  • Old websocket is removed SAS-302
  • Expected wait time has been given a new UI and is working as intended SAS-256
  • Overnight updates now retry cleanly and display a retry tag SAS-249

docs.title: ⚙️ Changed
docs.text:
• Language change text has been adjusted to indicate english is default SAS-292
  • Seat limits are now based on the last 30 days SAS-293
  • New portal now respects feature flags SAS-294 & SAS-295 & SAS-296
  • accountDisabled is now in the default list SAS-297
  • 'telus' flag now applies digitalUser flag SAS-298
  • 'us-west-1' is now the default install region SAS-299
  • 'logout' button in profile changed to 'sign out of shadow agent' SAS-303

docs.title: 🐛 Fixed
docs.text:
• Wrap timers not showing if invoked by ACW SAS-247
  • Showing internal calls incorrectly on refresh SAS-98
  • Clear filter button shows up before filters SAS-195
  • Download button for leaderboard fixed SAS-275
  • Filters are now accurate in queue leaderboard SAS-274
  • Implemented a fix for ringcentral access tokens expiring early SAS-308
  • Implemented a fix for overflow calls showing as answered SAS-309
